content.gatha1: Manujassa pamattacārino, taṇhā vaḍḍhati māluvā viya;
content.gathalast: So plavatīplavatiplavatipalavetīuplavati hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
content.gatha1: Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;
content.gathalast: Sokā tassa pavaḍḍhanti, abhivaṭṭhaṃvaabhivaḍḍhaṃvaabhivaṭṭaṃvaabhivuḍḍhaṃva bīraṇaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
content.gathalast: Sokā tamhā papatanti, udabinduva pokkharā.
content.gatha1: Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
content.gathalast: Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappunaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yathāpi mūle anupaddave daḷhe, chinnopi rukkho punareva rūhati;
content.gathalast: Evampi taṇhānusaye anūhate, nibbattatī dukkhamidaṃ punappunaṃ.
content.gatha1: Yassa chattiṃsati sotā, manāpasavanā bhusā;
content.gathalast: Māhāvāhāvāhāvāhā vahanti duddiṭṭhiṃ, saṅkappā rāganissitā.
content.gatha1: Savanti sabbadhi sotā, latā uppajjaubbhijjaubbhijjaubbhijjaubbhijja tiṭṭhati;
content.gathalast: Tañca disvā lataṃ jātaṃ, mūlaṃ paññāya chindatha.
content.gatha1: Saritāni sinehitāni ca, somanassāni bhavanti jantuno;
content.gathalast: Te sātasitā sukhesino, te ve jātijarūpagā narā.
content.gatha1: Tasiṇāya purakkhatā pajā, parisappanti sasova bandhitobādhito ;
content.gathalast: Saṃyojanasaṅgasattakā, dukkhamupenti punappunaṃ cirāya.
content.gatha1: Tasiṇāya purakkhatā pajā, parisappanti sasova bandhito;
content.gathalast: Tasmā tasiṇaṃ vinodaye, ākaṅkhantabhikkhū ākaṅkhībhikkhu ākaṅkhaṃ virāgamattano.
content.gatha1: Yo nibbanatho vanādhimutto, vanamutto vanameva dhāvati;
content.gathalast: Taṃ puggalametha passatha, mutto bandhanameva dhāvati.
content.gatha1: Na taṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā, yadāyasaṃ dārujapabbajañcadārūjaṃ babbajañcadārūjaṃ babbajañca ;
content.gathalast: Sārattarattā maṇikuṇḍalesu, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā.
content.gatha1: Etaṃ daḷhaṃ bandhanamāhu dhīrā, ohārinaṃ sithilaṃ duppamuñcaṃ;
content.gathalast: Etampi chetvāna paribbajanti, anapekkhino kāmasukhaṃ pahāya.
content.gatha1: Ye rāgarattānupatanti sotaṃ, sayaṃkataṃ makkaṭakova jālaṃ;
content.gathalast: Etampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrā, anapekkhino sabbadukkhaṃ pahāya.
content.gatha1: Muñca pure muñca pacchato, majjhe muñca bhavassa pāragū;
content.gathalast: Sabbattha vimuttamānaso, na punaṃ jātijaraṃ upehisi.
content.gatha1: Vitakkamathitassa jantuno, tibbarāgassa subhānupassino;
content.gathalast: Bhiyyo taṇhā pavaḍḍhati, esa kho daḷhaṃesa gāḷhaṃ karoti bandhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Vitakkūpasame ca vitakkūpasameva (ka.) yo rato, asubhaṃ bhāvayate sadā sato;
content.gathalast: Esaeso kho byanti kāhiti, esaeso checchati mārabandhanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Niṭṭhaṅgato asantāsī, vītataṇho anaṅgaṇo;
content.gathalast: Acchindi bhavasallāni, antimoyaṃ samussayo.
content.gatha1: Vītataṇho anādāno, niruttipadakovido;
content.gathalast: Sa ve ‘‘antimasārīro, mahāpañño mahāpuriso’’ti vuccati.
content.gatha1: Sabbābhibhū sabbavidūhamasmi, sabbesu dhammesu anūpalitto;
content.gathalast: Sabbañjaho taṇhakkhaye vimutto, sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyyaṃ.
content.gatha1: Sabbadānaṃ dhammadānaṃ jināti, sabbarasaṃ dhammaraso jināti;
content.gathalast: Sabbaratiṃ dhammarati jināti, taṇhakkhayo sabbadukkhaṃ jināti.
content.gatha1: Hananti bhogā dummedhaṃ, no ca pāragavesino;
content.gathalast: Bhogataṇhāya dummedho, hanti aññeva attanaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tiṇadosāni khettāni, rāgadosā ayaṃ pajā;
content.gathalast: Tasmā hi vītarāgesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tiṇadosāni khettāni, dosadosā ayaṃ pajā;
content.gathalast: Tasmā hi vītadosesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
content.gatha1: Tiṇadosāni khettāni, mohadosā ayaṃ pajā;
content.gathalast: Tasmā hi vītamohesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
content.gatha1: (Tiṇadosāni khettāni, icchādosā ayaṃ pajā;
content.gathalast: Tasmā hi vigaticchesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.) ( ) videsapotthakesu natthi, aṭṭhakathāyampi na dissati
Tasmā hi vītataṇhesu, dinnaṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
